attributes.action: Award the People of the Country of Ukraine the George Cross.
attributes.additional_details:
1. To recognise the inspirational and continuing heroic struggle against consistent and continuous attacks by a foreign Nation.

2. So that the Honour will serve to forever embody the heroism and the devotion of a democratic Nation in resisting a foreign aggressor.
attributes.background: In the spirit of King George VI, make a recommendation to HM Queen Elizabeth II to confer the Honour to the People and the Nation of Ukraine to forever remind the World of her Heroism.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
